mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, faq.*, board.category_title from faqboard faq, board_category board where (faq.title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or faq.content like '%'||#{search}||'%') and faq.category=board.category_num)a where a.rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rn, board_category.category_title as category_title, faqboard.title as title, faqboard.readcount as readcount, faqboard.num as num from faqboard, board_category where faqboard.category=board_category.category_num)a where a.rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by num desc

select * from(select rownum rn, board_category.category_title as category_title, faqboard.title as title, faqboard.readcount as readcount, faqboard.num as num, faqboard.content as content, faqboard.fileName as fileName from faqboard, board_category where faqboard.category=board_category.category_num)a where num = #{num}
select count(*) from faqboard where title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or content like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select count(*) from faqboard faq, board_category board where faq.category=board.category_num and board.category_title=#{mode}
mapper.update: update faqboard set readCount=readCount+1 where num=#{num}
update faqboard set title=#{title}, category=#{category}, content=#{content}, reg_date=sysdate where num=#{num}
update faqboard set re_step=re_step+1 where re_step>#{re_step}
